content.question: Samples of DNA were isolated from four different individuals and each sample was digested by the same restriction enzymes. Gel electrophoresis was used to separate the resulting DNA fragments and the results are shown above. These data best support which of the following hypotheses?

choices.label: Individual 1 is the offspring of 2 and 3.
Individual 1 is the offspring of 3 and 4.
Individual 2 is the offspring of 1 and 3.
Individual 2 is the offspring of 1 and 4.
Individual 3 is the offspring of 1 and 4.

content.answer: Individual 2 is the offspring of 1 and 3.

skill.text: 6.B: Support a claim with evidence from biological principles, concepts, processes, and data.
